game.name: Coasteroid
game.genres: Casual, Indie, Racing, Simulation, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Includes level editor, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The galaxy is your theme park. Build wild roller coasters across alien worlds, carve tunnels through planets, and launch riders into orbit. Customize every track, decoration, and color before letting the universe try it out!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The galaxy is your theme park. Build wild roller coasters across alien worlds, carve tunnels through planets, and launch riders into orbit. Customize every track, decoration, and color before letting the universe try it out!
